attributes.title: 2018 Toyota FJ Cruiser 4.0 V6

attributes.description:
Vehicle sold with 5year/60 000km Service Plan, 5year/150 000km Warranty, 5year Road Side Assistance and an additional 5year/850 000Km Engine Warranty applicable for the Original Owner Only.  
Features include 

Rear Park Distance Control Sensors 
Rear view (reverse) Camera
Keyless Entry (Remote Start/Stop)
10,25 Inch Floating Touch Screen Multimedia Display 
Multicolour Ambient Lighting 
Wireless Charging
Intelligent Voice Control 

Finance options are available. Trade Ins welcome and nationwide delivery at an agreed cost. Buy a Chery with Confidence and Peace of mind at Chery Shelly Beach

attributes.description: At Action Ford Roodepoort, 93 William Nicole Drive Constantia, you will always find a good quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles goes through a quality check to make sure that our vehicles are in a good condition. All our vehicles must have a full service history. All our vehicles are Accedent free (No structural damage). Most of our vehicles have standard warranties and if the vehicle is out of warranty, we can provide you with a warranty at a cost to give you peace of mind. We always strive in good customer service.
